resources.string: Changelog
Get started
Skip
Welcome to ScenePeek
A free and open-source client for TMDB & Jellyseerr
What's new in %1$s for %2$s
TMDB
Connect your TMDB account to access your watchlist, ratings, lists and more.
Jellyseerr
Connect to your Jellyseerr instance to request movies and TV shows instantly.
IMDb & TMDB Link Handling
ScenePeek can open URLs from IMDb & TMDB in the app. This can be useful for opening links to movies, TV shows and people directly in the app.
- Allow user to switch between grid and list view on media lists
- Add new discover filters. You can now also discover movies and tv shows by filtering with ratings and minimum votes.
- Display media favorite status on list details
- Fix an issue with discover filters between movies and tv shows
- Huge updates to ScenePeek codebase. An iOS version will soon be released!
- View posters in full screen for movies, TV shows, and people. Click any poster on a details screen to expand it to full screen!
- Add Rotten Tomatoes and Metacritic scores
- Enable login for Jellyfin/Emby users with empty passwords
- Migrate deprecated encryption library. If you were previously connected on TMDB, you'll need to re-login.
- Improve search functionality. You can now get categorized results for movies, tv shows, people, or just search through all!
- Show media release year on search and discover results
- Added a custom color theme option! Head to Settings > Appearance to give the app a more personal touch
- Add detailed error messages on jellyseerr login
- Add detailed warning when CSRF is enabled on user's jellyseerr instance
- Redesign home screen. Add sections to easily find trending, popular, upcoming and top rated movies and tv shows.
- Favorites are now categorized to movies and tv shows
- Fixed an issue where the app crashed due to invalid movie cast data
- Discover now includes year filtering. Find movies by year, decade, or year range
- Discover now includes sorting options. Sort by year, ratings, revenue, and more
- Redesigned empty state visuals for watchlist, ratings, and empty lists
- Add experimental warning and email support field on Jellyseerr login
- Introducing new season & episode details screen! You can now view information about each season and episode, and if you're logged into to TMDB, you can also rate individual episodes.
- Introduce collections screen! Show if movie belongs to a collection and lists all the movies included in that collection
- Discover now also include the keyword filter
- Show keywords on a movie or TV show information that describe its plot or mood
- Genres and keywords are now clickable, taking you to Discover with the corresponding filter applied
